solution_line_template: The interest that this person will get equals ${principal_amount} * {interest_rate_percent}%/year * {num_years} years = $<<{principal_amount}*{interest_rate_percent}*{percent_to_decimal_factor}*{num_years}={total_interest}>>{total_interest}.
After two years the amount found at the bank is ${principal_amount} + ${total_interest} = $<<{principal_amount}+{total_interest}={final_amount}>>{final_amount}.
